job_details.Functieomschrijving:
+ Leadership
       This is
       who
       we are
       Get to know us
     * Upskill Programs
     * We're here to help

   Developing on AWS

   9 September, 2024 - Hilversum, The Netherlands

   Over the last few years, Amazon Web Services (AWS) has become one of the leaders in the field of Cloud Technology, as well as a reliable partner for Cloud migrations or Greenfield Application Development. This 3-day workshop will give you practical experience with the most important AWS services. Gain practical experience with key AWS services and unleash your project's potential on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform.

   Book this training

   (excl. VAT) 3 days, Hilversum, English

   Looking to upskill your team(s) or organization?

   Max will gladly help you further with custom training solutions.

   Cloud Training Advisor

   What will you learn?

   In this 3-day course, you will discover core AWS services, their uses, and best practices. Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications using AWS. Acquire proficiency utilizing the AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development. Gain insights into the shared responsibility model, application lifecycle management, CI/CD pipelines, serverless applications, containerization, and AWS security best practices

    1. Understand core AWS services and architecture best practices.
    2. Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications on AWS.
    3. Utilize AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development.
    4. Apply cloud-native principles and write code for serverless applications.
    5. Implement CI/CD pipelines and containerize applications in the development process.
    6. Follow AWS security best practices for code authoring and maintenance.

   Using the AWS SDK

     * Set up the AWS and developer credentials for Java, C#/.NET, Python, and JavaScript.
     * Interact with AWS services and develop solutions by using the AWS SDK.

   Deployment at Scale

     * Use Amazon ElastiCache to improve application scalability.
     * Use containers in the development process.
     * Leverage the CI/CD pipeline to deploy applications on AWS.
job_details.full_text:
Certified Developer

+ Leadership
       This is
       who
       we are
       Get to know us
     * Upskill Programs
     * We're here to help

   Developing on AWS

   9 September, 2024 - Hilversum, The Netherlands

   Over the last few years, Amazon Web Services (AWS) has become one of the leaders in the field of Cloud Technology, as well as a reliable partner for Cloud migrations or Greenfield Application Development. This 3-day workshop will give you practical experience with the most important AWS services. Gain practical experience with key AWS services and unleash your project's potential on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform.

   Book this training

   (excl. VAT) 3 days, Hilversum, English

   Looking to upskill your team(s) or organization?

   Max will gladly help you further with custom training solutions.

   Cloud Training Advisor

   What will you learn?

   In this 3-day course, you will discover core AWS services, their uses, and best practices. Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications using AWS. Acquire proficiency utilizing the AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development. Gain insights into the shared responsibility model, application lifecycle management, CI/CD pipelines, serverless applications, containerization, and AWS security best practices

    1. Understand core AWS services and architecture best practices.
    2. Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications on AWS.
    3. Utilize AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development.
    4. Apply cloud-native principles and write code for serverless applications.
    5. Implement CI/CD pipelines and containerize applications in the development process.
    6. Follow AWS security best practices for code authoring and maintenance.

   Using the AWS SDK

     * Set up the AWS and developer credentials for Java, C#/.NET, Python, and JavaScript.
     * Interact with AWS services and develop solutions by using the AWS SDK.

   Deployment at Scale

     * Use Amazon ElastiCache to improve application scalability.
     * Use containers in the development process.
     * Leverage the CI/CD pipeline to deploy applications on AWS.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on training and practical experience with AWS services for application development, deployment, and debugging. It does not involve the core responsibilities or typical projects of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer, nor does it mention any specific AI/ML modeling tasks, generative models, or advanced AI concepts. The emphasis is on cloud infrastructure and traditional software development practices within the AWS ecosystem, making it a non-technical role in the context of AI/ML engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions developing, deploying, and debugging cloud-based applications, utilizing AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs, writing code for serverless applications, and containerizing applications. These are all core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications using AWS

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly states acquiring proficiency in using AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development.
job_tasks.phrase: Acquire proficiency utilizing the AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions writing code for serverless applications, which is a software development task.
The description highlights implementing CI/CD pipelines and containerizing applications as part of the development process.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement CI/CD pipelines and containerize applications in the development process

job_tasks.justification: The description details setting up developer credentials and using the AWS SDK to interact with AWS services and develop solutions, which are software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Set up the AWS and developer credentials for Java, C#/.NET, Python, and JavaScript. Interact with AWS services and develop solutions by using the AWS SDK.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions using Amazon ElastiCache to improve application scalability and leveraging CI/CD pipelines for deployment, which are aspects of building scalable and deployable applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Use Amazon ElastiCache to improve application scalability. Leverage the CI/CD pipeline to deploy applications on AWS.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions understanding the 'shared responsibility model' and 'AWS security best practices', which implies an understanding of operational and security contexts relevant to cloud applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Gain insights into the shared responsibility model, application lifecycle management, CI/CD pipelines, serverless applications, containerization, and AWS security best practices
